description: This header file declares the interface for managing command categories within a utility module. It includes functions for creating, destroying, and manipulating command categories, as well as retrieving commands and generating completion suggestions.

methods.name: categoryCreate
methods.description: Creates a new command category with the specified name and description.

methods.name: categoryDestroy
methods.description: Destroys a command category and frees associated resources.

methods.name: categorySetAdvanced
methods.description: Marks the category as advanced, so it is only shown when advanced mode is enabled.

methods.name: categoryAddCommand
methods.description: Adds a command to the specified category.

methods.name: categoryGetCommand
methods.description: Retrieves a command from the category by name, searching both long and short names.

methods.name: categoryGetCompletions
methods.description: Provides a list of command name completions matching a given partial input.

methods.name: categoryPrint
methods.description: Prints the help or description of the category, with options for interactivity and displaying advanced commands.
